title: Client doesnt open on mac after patch
body: tried reinstalling everytime i try to open the game it just instantly closes after

replies.body: Heya, this issue might not be related to your game files but your network trying to get to the patching service and launch.  Check your firewall settings or any anti-virus blocks- our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) can help with that!  Should the issue continue, our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can also help rule out some possibilities.  Let me know if that helps!
hextech repair tool didnt do anything besides bring it to the old client which makes me rdownload the new one

Not adding any useful information here, but being stuck in a loop of crashes after (apparently successfully) downloading the patch, I decided to reinstall the whole game from the old and the new clients, and now it's not even bringing me to the login page. The app just crashes.

Hey man I have a Mac too and i've noticed something about the way League updates on a mac. Basically the icon sits in the task bar doing nothing right. Well, it used to include a little status bar on that icon but it doesn't anymore for some reason with the new client. Instead, as long as the icon is down there, and has the black dot underneath it its working its magic. Which sucks because you can't see it working and what not and have no estimation of its completion. But I usually just let it go (cue Frozen music) and it will load within like...20min tops.
I have the same problem, the icon disappears. The game completely shuts down.
